title: ARAM lad
body: just played an ARAM with top bloke, who brough the whole team skins just because he was traded his main champion Riven xD

replies.body: YAY this is good! I'd love to give all the happy positive people gifts but I never have enough RL gold{{item:3070}}
It's the thought that counts right! :D

I'd say skin boost - either way, good job spreading the love.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Woo positivity! Skin Boost tho or actual mystery gifts at end? Cause both are great but one is extra fantastically generous!
just skin boost, ive had a mystery gift given once

Still tho! Gotta love it. I've given a skin boost once or twice when I've had a few 100 RP left over from something, but I don't play ARAMs much :) It's nice to see people who just do something nice for virtually no gain.

This week happened to me twice!
I tried to trade knowing probably nobody would swap Heim for Leona and Lux for Braum but it happened both times!
its always good to see some memebers of the community are nice and genours! 1 act of random kindness a day makes the world a better place!
i wasted all my rp on the skin boosts XD
